name: Mall Taxi: Smart Driving
description:
Mall Taxi: Smart Driving is shopping mall give public transport let people have fun Shop-in with the most comfortable and convenient buying experience in this taxi sim. You have to show your extreme driving and parking skills. Try to become an expert driver. Run your taxi through the big city and shopping mall. Pick up the passengers and drive them safely to their dropping point. Watch out the traffic on the road because the life of the taxi driver isn’t easy. So tighten your seat belt and drive the car carefully. The main objective of the taxi simulation game is to drop the passengers to the shopping mall. There are many interesting levels of this racing game which covers the easy as well as tough heights. Follow the points for the safe journey.
Features:
- Best shopping mall great taxi game
- Amazing taxi mode
- Amazing taxi simulator mission mode
- Realistic 3D big shopping mall environment
- Awesome taxi driving gameplay and sound effects
- Different camera angels
- Super local mall game with excellent Interiors.
